alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Dawes; North Sioux; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued April 01 at 4:06PM CDT until April 05 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow and near-blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of 12 or more inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...North and central portions of the Nebraska Panhandle including Chadron, Alliance, and Scottsbluff. Highest snowfall totals possible along the Pine Ridge. * WHEN...From Monday morning through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Prepare for possible blizzard conditions. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte; Dawes; North Sioux; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux
